core_meaning: Square between Uranus and Jupiter drives friction/work. Uranus: . Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Mentorship, promotions, strategic expansion. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.relationships: Goodwill, generosity, shared purpose. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Scaling revenue, windfalls, ethical growth. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Liver, metabolic balance; avoid excess. Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Uranus Square Jupiter
en.core: Square between Uranus and Jupiter drives friction/work. Uranus: . Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

hi.title: Uranus Square Jupiter (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Uranus और Jupiter का Square — ऊर्जा friction/work के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
